name: Elections Commission - W. K. B. P. S. Fernando of the Beruwala Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of the member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - W. M. A. K. Senevirathne of the Bandaragama Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of the member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - H. G. Piyarathna, of the Galenbindunuwewa Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated office of the member of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party
